description: Thaw, frozen kale and frozen artichoke hearts
Cajun-seasoned chicken breast grilled and served on a sizzling skillet with blackened seasoned shrimp, garlic and thyme.
Super moist with chunks of dark chocolate, nuts and hot fudge. Big enough to share, served with two scoops of vanilla ice cream.
Cedar-seasoned grilled chicken, Granny Smith apple relish, rice, cranberries, honey-glazed pecans and quinoa.
Chipotle-lime chicken, salsa verde and pico
Grilled chicken breast, tortilla strips, cilantro-limeglaze and Mexi-ranch dressing topped with melted Cheddar cheese. Served with Spanish rice and pico.
